sakai:query-template: (((type:g AND resourceType:authorizable) ${_categoryAnd} AND (name:(${q}) OR title:(${q}) OR description:(${q}) OR title:(${q}) OR content:(${q}) OR widgetdata:(${q}) OR ngram:(${q}) OR edgengram:(${q})${_taguuids})) OR ((type:u AND resourceType:authorizable) AND (name:(${q}) OR firstName:(${q}) OR lastName:(${q}) OR email:(${q}) OR title:(${q}) OR content:(${q}) OR widgetdata:(${q}) OR ngram:(${q}) OR edgengram:(${q})${_taguuids})))
sakai:title: Users, Groups
sakai:shortDescription: Get the profiles of select users and groups.
sakai:parameters: {"name" : "q", "description" : "The term you want to match against. This will match any property on the user or group profile"}
{"name" : "sortOn", "description" : "The name of the property you wish to sort on. This only has any affect if it is used with the sortOrder parameter. The default is score"}
{"name" : "sortOrder", "description" : "The order you wish to sort in. Either 'asc' or 'desc'."}
sakai:description: Get the profiles of select users and groups filtered by the provided query term.
